Contact

Our lab is jointly located at the Flatiron Institute and NYU Center for Neural Science. You can email Prof. Sueyeon Chung at schung@flatironinstitute.org.


NYU Address

Center for Neural Science, New York University. 4 Washington Place Meyer Hall Floor 10. New York, NY 10003

Flatiron Institute Address

Center for Computational Neuroscience, Flatiron Institute. 160 5th Avenue Floor 4. New York, NY 10010


Visitor Information
